short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Re-implements Googleâ„¢ image search feature to filter images by megapixels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Restores ability for the user to select a minimum megapixel value to search images by, i.e. 2MP, 4MP, 6MP, 8MP, 10MP, 12MP, 15MP, 20MP, 40MP, 70MP. This functionality is available in Tools -> Size.

Code at https://github.com/danieljbingham/google-image-sizer - feel free to submit an issue or make a pull request on github!
